entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
